attributes.action: repeal the measure allowing the police to take fingerprints of members of the public who are not under arrest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The police project "Lantern" provides police forces with mobile fingerprint scanners to check the fingerprints of members of the public against a national database. Participation is currently voluntary, but legislation is already in place to make it compulsory.

This measure is another attack on the presumption of innocence, and an unwarranted extension of police powers.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "repeal the measure allowing the police to take fingerprints of members of the public who are not under arrest."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11189.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NoFingerprints/
